text: The middle school where Mr. Bernoski teaches is raising money to make improvements to the recreation center. Each grade picks a different fund-raising activity. They designate one day to raise money.

The 6th grade class sells Smoothie Bars.

A Smoothie Bar sells for $5 eac.It costs $15.50 for refrigeration to keep the bars cold.

-They spend $25.50 on advertising.

They sell 100 bars.
